wantsEscapeKey 
  public boolean wantsEscapeKey()
Responsibility from ECKeyFilter. Returns false, so the escape key can be used to activate the cancel button.
wantsReturnKey 
  public boolean wantsReturnKey()
Responsibility from ECKeyFilter. Returns false if the text field is not editable, so the return key can be used to activate the default button.
